text: Alfredo Montenegro Martino (born 22 July 1955) is a Peruvian rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Peruvian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Peru Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Rowers at the 1983 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Peru
title: Alfredo Montenegro
